context: Hi! What sort of movies do you like?
I really enjoy drama/biography. For example I enjoyed Phantom Thread (2017)
Oh, that's a movie I haven't seen. If you like Drama, I really enjoyed Allied (2016) recently.
I think that's on my list to see. Did you see The Darkest Hour (2011) ?
Yes it was fab! I also really enjoyed Dunkirk (2017) - I haven't watched the original yet, but it is on my list. Have you seen Dunkirk (2017) ?
That should have been Darkest Hour (2017)
Yes, loved Dunkirk (2017) I really want to see 12 Strong (2018) I didn't see it in the theater because the reviews weren't all that great
I do like the classics.. I can recommend Ice Cold in Alex (1958) and Battle of Britain (1969) for a Sunday afternoon marathon. I've not seen 12 Strong (2018) - I will have to check it out.
One of my favorite films was The Hurt Locker (2008)
Jodie Foster? I don't think I've seen it...
Oh, you'd like it! Gotta go watch some movies now.
resp: Is it similar to Panic Room (2002)?

context.content: Hello
Hi! What kind of movies do you like?
I love exciting and daring adventure movies that are also humorous and entertaining, and heartwarming and wholesome family movies. Do you have any recommendations for me?
context.feelings: I'm so excited to discover new movies and get some awesome recommendations! I can't wait to find a movie that's both exciting and daring, humorous and entertaining, and heartwarming and wholesome. This is going to be so much fun!

context.content: Have you seen The Secret Life of Pets (2016)? It's a great family movie.
What's The Secret Life of Pets (2016) about?
context.feelings: I'm excited to explore The Secret Life of Pets (2016) as a family movie, but I'm not sure if it covers the exciting and daring adventure aspect. The recommender is doing a good job, but I hope they recommend something that fits all my preferences.

context.content: It's about a dog that travels to a new land and finds a mysterious door that leads him to a magical place. It's very exciting and fun.
That sounds fun, but I'm looking for something with a bit more daring adventure. Do you have any other recommendations?
context.feelings: I'm not sure if The Secret Life of Pets (2016) covers all the genres I'm looking for. It sounds fun and exciting, but I'm not sure if it's a daring adventure movie. The recommender is doing a good job, but I need something that fits all my preferences. I hope the next recommendation will be a perfect match!

context.content: I would also recommend The Adventures of Milo and Otis (1986). It's an oldie but a goodie.
